text: Paulista Futebol Clube, or Paulista as they are usually called, is a Brazilian football team from Jundiaí, São Paulo. It was founded on May 17, 1909. Besides being an important club of Sao Paulo state, Paulista is also known in Brazil as one of the winners of Copa do Brasil. This national tournament is the most important championship in Brazil (together with Brasileirao). Paulista won this league in 2005. ==Achievements== *Copa do Brasil: 1 ::2005 *Campeonato Brasileiro Série C: 1 ::2001 *Campeonato Paulista Série A2: 2 ::1968, 2001 *Copa Paulista: 3 ::1999, 2010, 2011 *Copa São Paulo de Juniores: 1 ::1997 Category:Football clubs in São Paulo (state) Category:1909 establishments in Brazil
title: Paulista Futebol Clube
